name: Coronavirus pixeldicine
description:
Story

You are the last white cell in Jony´s body, a bumb with a too much diseases.
You have to open your way killing the virus and bacteries in a top-down shooter until you find the source of all, the Coronavirus itself.

Key Features:

- Top-Down View Action Bullet Shooting Game

- Power Ups to improve your stats

- 7 weapons to kill your enemies in diferent ways

- 9 different enemies based on real life disseases and virus + 1 final Boss

- 2 Procedural levels + 1 boss level

Controls:

WASD: Move

Left click: Shoot

E: Pick Items/Open Chests

Space: Dash

F: Fagocite

ESC: Pause Menu

The hero, the last white cell

Bacteriophage enemy

Infectious bubo



Note: The game was made in two months and still haven´t a properly ending
